solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean PredictTheWinner(int[] nums) {--newline--        return helper(nums, 0, nums.length-1, new Integer[nums.length][nums.length])>=0;--newline--    }--newline--    private int helper(int[] nums, int s, int e, Integer[][] mem){    --newline--        if(mem[s][e]==null)--newline--            mem[s][e] = s==e ? nums[e] : Math.max(nums[e]-helper(nums,s,e-1,mem),nums[s]-helper(nums,s+1,e,mem));--newline--        return mem[s][e];--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
